USA: The short-lived Popham Colony was founded.
Russia: False Dmitriy II, another claimant to the identity of Dmitriy Ivanovich, obtained financial and military support from a group of Polish magnates.
Ireland: The Flight of the Earls: The departure from Ireland of Hugh O'Neill, 2nd Earl of Tyrone and Rory O'Donnell, 1st Earl of Tyrconnell.
England: Jamestown was founded in the Virginia Colony and was the first permanent English colony in the Americas.
Cuba: Havana is named capital of Cuba.
China: Euclid's Elements was first translated into Chinese.
